sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 24 cm. What is the length of each of its sides?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of each side, we can divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Length of each side = Perimeter / Number of sides
Length of each side = 24 cm / 3
Length of each side = 8 cm

Each side of the equilateral triangle is 8 cm long.
